page.title: 09HOLIDAYS
page.content: The prosperity of the area is shown by the fact that less than 6 in every hundred do not go on holiday each year and nearly a third holiday more than twice a year.Most people take their holidays in the U.K.,withseaside resorts the main attraction.The most popular areas are Devon/Cornwall and Wales.Aberystwyth,Tenby,Criccieth,Rhyl ,Barmouth,Aberdovey,Padstow and Sennen Cove are all frequently visited.However,a significant proportion holiday abroad.The most popular destinations are Spain,France and Germany.More exotic locations are Israel,Greece,U.S.A.and Thailand.
